    • Constructor Detail

      • Player

        public Player​(int id,
              java.lang.String name,
              EnumColorPlayer color)
        Instantiates a new Player setting the id, name and color with the given parameters. It creates a new player board for the player and settings score and the field alive to the start value.
        Parameters:
        id - the id of the player
        name - the name of the player
        color - the color of the player
